page.description: Controls whether or not the ViewBox should be automatically refreshed when the control's width and/or height have changed.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Auto-refresh when ViewBox is resized]* property specifies whether or not the ViewBox should be refreshed (redrawn) automatically when the control's width and/or height change. If not checked, you can programmatically refresh the control using the ViewBox's [.refresh()] JavaScript method.
